headline: Why the S&P 500 May Get a New Member Soon
summary: Paramount Global could be on the chopping block if the S&P 500’s managers decide its impending merger with Skydance Media makes it too small for the benchmark large-cap index.

raw.headline: Why the S&P 500 May Get a New Member Soon
raw.summary: Paramount Global could be on the chopping block if the S&P 500’s managers decide its impending merger with Skydance Media makes it too small for the benchmark large-cap index.

headline: Will Paramount Stay in the S&P 500? Here’s an Update On the Situation.
summary: Skydance Media is set to close on its deal to purchase a controlling interest in  Paramount Global  on Thursday raising questions about whether the company will remain in  S&P Dow Jones Indices hasn’t announced any replacement for Paramount, and it’s possible it will remain right where it is.  Many investors assumed that Paramount would be dropped from the index due to its small market capitalization, opening the way for potential additions like Robinhood Markets or AppLovin.  After the deal, the market value of Paramount, which owns CBS, a movie studio, a group of cable networks, and operates a streaming service, should be around $11 billion, half the current minimum for new entrants into the index of $22.7 billion.

After the deal, the market value of Paramount, which owns CBS, a movie studio, a group of cable networks, and operates a streaming service, should be around $11 billion, half the current minimum for new entrants into the index of $22.7 billion.

headline: Tom Lee: Ethereum Is Having A '2017 Bitcoin Moment', Could Hit $15,000 By End Of 2025
summary: Fundstrat co-founder Tom Lee predicts Ethereum (CRYPTO: ETH) may possibly overtake Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) thanks to its use cases for Wall Street. What Happened: In an appearance on the Bankless podcast on Aug.6, Tom Lee predicts Ethereum could deliver a 100x return and potentially flip Bitcoin’s market cap, driven by accelerating Wall Street adoption and Ethereum’s central role in blockchain infrastructure. His new firm, Bitmine Immersion Techs (AMEX:BMNR), has already acquired 833,000 ETH, wort

headline: Coinbase’s Grip on Crypto Faces Test in a Market That Won’t Slow Down
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Coinbase is the closest thing crypto has to a blue-chip name: a booming exchange that joined the S&P 500 this year and at one point surged 69% to a $106 billion market value. summary: Robinhood's long-term shareholders might be hit with an unfortunate sense of déjà vu in the very near future.
